thread.title: Chief whip Doherty in shock offer to Sinn Fein
thread.title_full: Chief whip Doherty in shock offer to Sinn Fein

title: Chief whip Doherty in shock offer to Sinn Fein
text: Chief whip Doherty in shock offer to Sinn Fein Independent.ie Government Chief Whip Regina Doherty is at the centre of another political storm this weekend after she broke ranks with the Fine Gael leadership to become the first-ever elected party member to publicly state she is open to forming a coalition with Sinn Fein. http://www.independent.ie/irish-news/politics/chief-whip-doherty-in-shock-offer-to-sinn-fein-35349631.html http://www.independent.ie/irish-news/article35349630.ece/75319/AUTOCROP/h342/2017-01-08_iri_27647396_I1.JPG I can work with anybody: Chief Whip Regina Doherty Government Chief Whip Regina Doherty is at the centre of another political storm this weekend after she broke ranks with the Fine Gael leadership to become the first-ever elected party member to publicly state she is open to forming a coalition with Sinn Fein. Share Chief whip Doherty in shock offer to Sinn Fein Independent.ie Government Chief Whip Regina Doherty is at the centre of another political storm this weekend after she broke ranks with the Fine Gael leadership to become the first-ever elected party member to publicly state she is open to forming a coalition with Sinn Fein. http://www.independent.ie/irish-news/politics/chief-whip-doherty-in-shock-offer-to-sinn-fein-35349631.html
